Reference

Storages and Formats

Data Formats and Storages to store data

storage_local_rds() storage_local_tsv()

Local storage

storage_s3_rds()

s3 storage

format_hysplit()

Format defintion for hysplit back trajectories

format_rolf()

rOstluft long format (rolf)

Resampling data

Functions for resampling data between different intervals and applying statistical methods

resample()

Resampling data

pad() pad_serie()

Pad data

statistic_fun_factory()

Factory to generate statistical functions

treshold_wrapper_function()

Wrapper function for minimum capture threshold

gap_wrapper_function()

wrapper function for maximum number of consecutive NA values

Unit conversion

Functions for converting between Volume and Mass concentrations

convert_unit() convert_multiple_units()

Convert the unit of a single parameter

conversion_fun_factory()

Factory to generate conversion functions

mass_to_parts()

Converts mass to volume concentration

parts_to_mass()

Converts mass to volume concentration

Data read functions

Read data files from different sources

read_airmo_csv()

Reads an AIRMO Export in CSV Format

read_airmo_dat()

Reads an AIRMO Export in DAT Format

read_ethz_iac()

Read an IAC/ETHZ meteo station file

read_ethz_iac_min10()

Read an IAC/ETHZ meteo station file

read_ethz_iac_min10_parameters()

Derive metadata (parameters, units etc) from an IAC/ETHZ meteo station file

read_meteoschweiz_smn()

Read a MeteoSchweiz SwissMetNet export file

read_smn()

Reads a file from the SwissMetNet of MeteoSwiss

read_smn_multiple()

Reads a file from the SwissMetNet of MeteoSwiss containing multiple Exports

split_smn()

Splits a file from the SwissMetNet of MeteoSwiss containing multiple Exports

Long <> Wide Format conversion

Convert between rOstluft Long format and an openair compatible Wide format

openair_to_rolf()

Converts data from openair format to rolf

rolf_to_openair()

Converts data from rolf format to an openair compatible Format

rolf_to_openair_single()

Converts one parameter in a rolf data frame to an openair compatible format

Utility functions

Some functions to make the life of a programmer easier

bind_rows_with_factor_columns()

bind rows of data frames with factors

import_directory()

Imports directory into store

meta_apply()

Transforms data based on an other meta table

rolf_apply_meta()

apply meta data to rolf data

rOstluft

rOstluft: data store and utility functions for Ostluft

transform_projection()

Map projection and datum transformation
